ticket.title: Clean up the list of excluded ivars that get added to assigns in a view test case
ticket.original-body:
ActionView::TestCase copies instance variables from the test case to view in the `_assigns` method. It excludes ivars that are set up and used by the test case, but the list of ivars currently includes a number of variables that are outdated (no longer exist) and excludes some new variables.
Patch forthcoming to clean that up.

version.title: Clean up the list of excluded ivars that get added to assigns in a view test case

version.body:
Patch: http://github.com/dchelimsky/rails/commit/7378fa34be0b5c6945ae8f4079b11ae3ff6b4ebc
Note that I didn't add any tests for this. Doing so would create a binding between the tests (they'd have to name all the ivars explicitly) and the implementation. The only risk is that somebody wants to use an instance variable name that is used internally by test case, which is a deeper design question than the specific contents of this list.
